title: 怎么召唤这些生物？
author: SilentSkyShine
txt_content:
版本1.11.21、恶魂骑着恶魂再骑着恶魂
2.不会打怪物的铁傀儡
3.不会打怪物的铁傀儡,上面骑着锁链套的僵尸
4.巨人僵尸上骑了个恶魂
5.骑骷髅马的浑身黑衣服的僵尸

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
1./summon ghast ~ ~ ~ {Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:ghast",Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:ghast",Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:ghast"}]}]}]}复制代码
2.
/summon villager_golem ~ ~ ~ {Attributes:[{Name:"generic.attackDamage",Base:0.0}]}复制代码
3.你 这 是 在 刁 难 我 胖 虎，明明就是第一个和第二个的综合体
/summon villager_golem ~ ~ ~ {Attributes:[{Name:"generic.attackDamage",Base:0.0}],Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:zombie",ArmorItems:[{id:"chainmail_boots",Count:1b},{id:"chainmail_leggings",Count:1b},{id:"chainmail_chestplate",Count:1b},{id:"chainmail_helmet",Count:1b}]}]}复制代码
4.换 汤 不 换 药
summon giant ~ ~ ~ {Passengers[{id:"minecraft:ghast"}]}复制代码
5.忘记骷髅马的id是改成skeleton_horse还是还用type了，如果召唤不出来就先把type后面的数字从1到5改一遍，还不行就把id改成skeleton_horse试试/summon horse ~ ~ ~ {Type:3,Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:zombie",ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:leather_boots",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Color:0}}},{id:"minecraft:zombie",ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:leather_leggings",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Color:0}}},{id:"minecraft:zombie",ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:leather_chestplate",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Color:0}}},{id:"minecraft:zombie",ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:leather_helmet",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Color:0}}}]}]}复制代码

replies.author: _旋风淼旺_
replies.txt_content: 首先4你就别想了，巨人僵尸早就没了

replies.author: _旋风淼旺_
replies.txt_content:
1./summon ghast ~ ~ ~ {Passengers:[{id:ghast,Passengers:[{id:ghast,Passengers:[{id:ghast}]}]}]}复制代码
2./scoreboard teams 1复制代码/scoreboard teams option 1 friendlyfire false复制代码
循环/scoreboard teams join 1 @e复制代码/summon villager_golem ~ ~ ~复制代码

replies.author: Liangzng
replies.txt_content: 安装个npcmod多么方便 想怎样骑都没问题

replies.author: _旋风淼旺_
replies.txt_content:
pineapple_ 发表于 2018-2-1 02:41
